title: The squeeze
full_text: The squeeze. Once a company hits a plateau in its market share, the pressure begins to mount. Investors want more of a return, shareholders want the stock price to go up. Managers pay attention to the metrics they’re held to, and the squeeze begins. At first, the squeeze …. Once a company hits a plateau in its market share, the pressure begins to mount.
